title: Invoice Management
description: Create professional invoices instantly with customizable templates and automated numbering
detailedDescription: BillFlow's invoice management system gives you complete control over your billing process. Design beautiful, branded invoices with our drag-and-drop editor, automatically generate sequential invoice numbers, and save time with smart templates that remember your most-used items and services.
benefits: Customizable invoice templates with your branding
Save frequently used items and services
Multiple invoice layouts to choose from

title: Payment Tracking
description: Monitor payment status in real-time and never miss a payment again
detailedDescription: Stay on top of your cash flow with comprehensive payment tracking. See which invoices are paid, pending, or overdue at a glance. Get instant notifications when clients make payments, and track payment history for complete financial visibility.

title: Client Management
description: Organize and manage all your client information in one central location
detailedDescription: Build stronger client relationships with our comprehensive client management system. Store contact details, billing preferences, payment history, and notes all in one place. Segment clients by industry, location, or custom tags for targeted communications.

title: Recurring Billing
description: Automate subscription payments and recurring invoices with flexible scheduling
detailedDescription: Set up automatic recurring billing for your subscription-based services. Configure weekly, monthly, quarterly, or custom billing cycles. BillFlow automatically generates and sends invoices, processes payments, and handles failed payment retries.

title: Reports & Analytics
description: Track revenue, payment trends, and financial metrics with interactive dashboards
detailedDescription: Make data-driven decisions with powerful analytics and reporting. View revenue trends, identify your best-paying clients, track outstanding invoices, and generate custom reports for any time period. Export data to Excel or PDF for accounting and tax purposes.

title: Payment Processing
description: Accept multiple payment methods including cards, ACH, and digital wallets
detailedDescription: Get paid faster with integrated payment processing. Accept credit cards, debit cards, ACH bank transfers, and popular digital wallets like Apple Pay and Google Pay. Secure payment links make it easy for clients to pay online with just a few clicks.

title: Payment Reminders
description: Automated email reminders for overdue invoices and upcoming payments
detailedDescription: Never chase payments manually again. Configure automatic reminder emails that go out before, on, and after invoice due dates. Customize reminder schedules and message templates to maintain professionalism while ensuring timely payments.
benefits: Before and after due date reminders

title: Bank-Level Security
description: PCI compliant encryption and secure data storage for complete peace of mind
detailedDescription: Your financial data is protected with enterprise-grade security. We use 256-bit SSL encryption, maintain PCI DSS Level 1 compliance, and conduct regular security audits. All payment information is tokenized and never stored on our servers.

title: Multi-Currency Support
description: Bill clients in their local currency with automatic exchange rate updates
detailedDescription: Expand your business globally with support for 150+ currencies. Automatically convert amounts at current exchange rates, or lock in custom rates for specific clients. Generate invoices in any currency and accept payments in your preferred currency.

title: Integrations
description: Connect seamlessly with 100+ popular apps including accounting and CRM tools
detailedDescription: BillFlow integrates with the tools you already use. Sync with QuickBooks, Xero, and other accounting platforms. Connect your CRM to keep client data synchronized. Use Zapier for custom integrations with 3,000+ apps.
